title: The Throne Under the Starry Sky - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Sci-fi
tags: Astrologers   Multiple Protagonists   Outer Space   Parallel Worlds   Romantic Subplot   Transported to Another World   Wars
author: Zhuxie Duowen   朱邪多闻
description:
There are two worlds just like the two sides of a coin. On one side, an Astrologer’s Apprentice, Jonah, was saddled with the prediction of Segnise, so he wandered all over the world to find the truth.
         On the other side, a revolutionary named Gu Tie rushed into the quantum computer network. When the two souls are gradually getting close to each other, the secret, which was buried under the core of the quantum computer, will eventually reveal itself. By that time, a ‘change’ awaits the world.>
